entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then clearing. Local blowing snow this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near noon then light late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 09:39 AM MST Wednesday 08 February 2023
